template.domain: Fire golem is found in volcano, magam based biome, lava pools
powers: cannot be harmed by normal weapons (melee or ranged)
template.personality: Aggressive and attacks on sight, burns everything in its path.
template.death_behavior: Explodes in a burst of flames, leaving behind a pool of lava.
template.hint: Its body glows intensely — perhaps cold might work.

template.domain: Skeletion warriors are seen in abandoned bone-covered hallways with crumbling stone walls
powers: uses a sword for close combat
carries a shield to block attacks
weaknesses: can be harmed with any type of attack (melee, ranged, or magic)
easily destroyed by strong force or blunt damage
template.personality: Silent, determined attacker that usually fights in small groups of 3 to 6.
template.death_behavior: Falls apart into bones and dust, leaving behind a rusty sword and shield.
template.hint: They seem fragile — a solid strike may shatter them quickly.

template.domain: Orcs are spotted in, trees, grassy plains, grassy hills, plateaus
powers: uses axes and clubs for melee combat
can throw spears or rocks at range
strong and resilient to physical attacks
can overpower weaker opponents with brute force
weaknesses: vulnerable to fire and magic attacks
not very intelligent, can be tricked easily
template.personality: Brutal and aggressive, often fights in groups of 3.
template.death_behavior: Collapses with a loud thud, leaving behind weapons and armor.
template.hint: They grunt and rush in — but don’t seem clever...

template.domain: Draogns are found in ancient throne chamber buried deep within the dungeon's heart, surrounded by treasure vaults and collapsed pillars
powers: can fly and swoop down on enemies
has tough scales that resist most attacks
can roar to intimidate and subdue enemies
uses its tail to strike or sweep enemies away
weaknesses: only vulnerable part is the eye and underbelly
can be distracted by shiny objects
cannot pass through narrow or small spaces
template.personality: Proud and territorial, hoards treasures. Kills on sight and does not negotiate.
template.death_behavior: Collapses with a thunderous roar, leaving behind a pile of treasure and scales.
template.hint: Its eyes track your movement — but its belly is less guarded.
